verses.name: Psalms 12:5
verses.text: For the oppression of the poor, for the sighing of the needy, now will I arise, saith the Lord; I will set him in safety from him that puffeth at him.

verses.name: Psalms 12:6
verses.text: The words of the Lord are pure words: as silver tried in a furnace of earth, purified seven times.

verses.name: Psalms 12:7
verses.text: Thou shalt keep them, O Lord, thou shalt preserve them from this generation for ever.

verses.name: Psalms 12:8
verses.text: The wicked walk on every side, when the vilest men are exalted.
